This reference lists possible [Workflow Task](/workers#workflow-task) <span id="i-a9666c78-2a52-4b84-9f61-e4e95bf65cbd" class="clickable-i clickable-link-preview">ðŸ”—</span><div id="preview-modal-a9666c78-2a52-4b84-9f61-e4e95bf65cbd" class="preview-modal"><div class="modal-header"><div id="x-a9666c78-2a52-4b84-9f61-e4e95bf65cbd" class="clickable-x clickable-link-preview">x</div><b>Link preview</b></div><div class="preview-modal-title">What is a Workflow Task?</div><div class="preview-modal-description">A Workflow Task is a Task that contains the context needed to make progress with a Workflow Execution.</div><div class="preview-modal-tags"><span class="preview-modal-tag">term</span> <span class="preview-modal-tag">explanation</span></div></div> errors and how to resolve them.

> For other types of errors, see [Temporal Failures](https://docs.temporal.io/kb/failures).

Each of the below errors corresponds with a [WorkflowTaskFailedCause](https://api-docs.temporal.io/#temporal.api.enums.v1.WorkflowTaskFailedCause), which appears in [Events](/workflows#event) under `workflow_task_failed_event_attributes`.

## Bad Cancel Timer Attributes {#bad-cancel-timer-attributes}

This error indicates that the [Workflow Task](/workers#workflow-task) <span id="i-7b07c915-6ac5-483b-ba68-c6aa4f121a49" class="clickable-i clickable-link-preview">ðŸ”—</span><div id="preview-modal-7b07c915-6ac5-483b-ba68-c6aa4f121a49" class="preview-modal"><div class="modal-header"><div id="x-7b07c915-6ac5-483b-ba68-c6aa4f121a49" class="clickable-x clickable-link-preview">x</div><b>Link preview</b></div><div class="preview-modal-title">What is a Workflow Task?</div><div class="preview-modal-description">A Workflow Task is a Task that contains the context needed to make progress with a Workflow Execution.</div><div class="preview-modal-tags"><span class="preview-modal-tag">term</span> <span class="preview-modal-tag">explanation</span></div></div> failed while attempting to cancel a Timer.

<!-- TODO add Timer term definition and link to it -->

Check your Timer attributes for a missing Timer Id value.
Add a valid Timer Id and redeploy the code.

## Bad Cancel Workflow Execution Attributes {#bad-cancel-workflow-execution-attributes}

The [Workflow Task](/workers#workflow-task) <span id="i-6f11c7ea-9558-4231-bd3f-b9aec2266976" class="clickable-i clickable-link-preview">ðŸ”—</span><div id="preview-modal-6f11c7ea-9558-4231-bd3f-b9aec2266976" class="preview-modal"><div class="modal-header"><div id="x-6f11c7ea-9558-4231-bd3f-b9aec2266976" class="clickable-x clickable-link-preview">x</div><b>Link preview</b></div><div class="preview-modal-title">What is a Workflow Task?</div><div class="preview-modal-description">A Workflow Task is a Task that contains the context needed to make progress with a Workflow Execution.</div><div class="preview-modal-tags"><span class="preview-modal-tag">term</span> <span class="preview-modal-tag">explanation</span></div></div> failed due to unset [CancelWorkflowExecution](/references/commands/#cancelworkflowexecution) attributes.

Reset any missing attributes and redeploy the Workflow Task.

## Bad Complete Workflow Execution Attributes {#bad-complete-workflow-execution-attributes}

This error indicates that the [Workflow Task](/workers#workflow-task) <span id="i-4c3754f7-14c4-42c0-bc3d-e89bd73ecaa3" class="clickable-i clickable-link-preview">ðŸ”—</span><div id="preview-modal-4c3754f7-14c4-42c0-bc3d-e89bd73ecaa3" class="preview-modal"><div class="modal-header"><div id="x-4c3754f7-14c4-42c0-bc3d-e89bd73ecaa3" class="clickable-x clickable-link-preview">x</div><b>Link preview</b></div><div class="preview-modal-title">What is a Workflow Task?</div><div class="preview-modal-description">A Workflow Task is a Task that contains the context needed to make progress with a Workflow Execution.</div><div class="preview-modal-tags"><span class="preview-modal-tag">term</span> <span class="preview-modal-tag">explanation</span></div></div> failed due to unset attributes on [CompleteWorkflowExecution](/references/commands/#completeworkflowexecution).

Reset any missing attributes.
Adjust the size of your Payload if it exceeds size limits.

## Bad Continue as New Attributes {#bad-continue-as-new-attributes}

This error indicates that the [Workflow Task](/workers#workflow-task) <span id="i-8ad280f9-1d7c-4ccc-aca8-727067fe3966" class="clickable-i clickable-link-preview">ðŸ”—</span><div id="preview-modal-8ad280f9-1d7c-4ccc-aca8-727067fe3966" class="preview-modal"><div class="modal-header"><div id="x-8ad280f9-1d7c-4ccc-aca8-727067fe3966" class="clickable-x clickable-link-preview">x</div><b>Link preview</b></div><div class="preview-modal-title">What is a Workflow Task?</div><div class="preview-modal-description">A Workflow Task is a Task that contains the context needed to make progress with a Workflow Execution.</div><div class="preview-modal-tags"><span class="preview-modal-tag">term</span> <span class="preview-modal-tag">explanation</span></div></div> failed to validate a [ContinueAsNew](/references/commands/#continueasnew) attribute.
The attribute could be unset or invalid.

Reset any missing attributes.
If the payload or memo exceeded size limits, adjust the input size.

Check that the [Workflow](/workflows) is validating search attributes after unaliasing keys.

## Bad Fail Workflow Execution Attributes {#bad-fail-workflow-execution-attributes}

This error indicates that the [Workflow Task](/workers#workflow-task) <span id="i-1b0afe3c-c4bd-41f0-b87a-ac4025092396" class="clickable-i clickable-link-preview">ðŸ”—</span><div id="preview-modal-1b0afe3c-c4bd-41f0-b87a-ac4025092396" class="preview-modal"><div class="modal-header"><div id="x-1b0afe3c-c4bd-41f0-b87a-ac4025092396" class="clickable-x clickable-link-preview">x</div><b>Link preview</b></div><div class="preview-modal-title">What is a Workflow Task?</div><div class="preview-modal-description">A Workflow Task is a Task that contains the context needed to make progress with a Workflow Execution.</div><div class="preview-modal-tags"><span class="preview-modal-tag">term</span> <span class="preview-modal-tag">explanation</span></div></div> failed due to unset [FailWorkflowExecution](/references/commands/#failworkflowexecution) attributes.

If you encounter this error, make sure that `StartToClostTimeout` or `ScheduleToCloseTimeout` are set.
Restart the [Worker](/workers) that the [Workflow](/workflows) and [Activity](/activities) are registered to.

## Bad Modify Workflow Properties Attributes {#bad-modify-workflow-properties-attributes}

This error indicates that the [Workflow Task](/workers#workflow-task) <span id="i-d995f363-2876-483e-9d0a-8996362beb65" class="clickable-i clickable-link-preview">ðŸ”—</span><div id="preview-modal-d995f363-2876-483e-9d0a-8996362beb65" class="preview-modal"><div class="modal-header"><div id="x-d995f363-2876-483e-9d0a-8996362beb65" class="clickable-x clickable-link-preview">x</div><b>Link preview</b></div><div class="preview-modal-title">What is a Workflow Task?</div><div class="preview-modal-description">A Workflow Task is a Task that contains the context needed to make progress with a Workflow Execution.</div><div class="preview-modal-tags"><span class="preview-modal-tag">term</span> <span class="preview-modal-tag">explanation</span></div></div> failed to validate attributes on a property in the Upsert Memo or in a payload.
These attributes are either unset or exceeding size limits.

Reset any unset and empty atrributes.
Adjust the size of the [Memo](/workflows/#memo) or payload to fit within the system's limits.

## Bad Record Marker Attributes {#bad-record-marker-attributes}

This error indicates that the [Workflow Task](/workers#workflow-task) <span id="i-837d8f1a-dd2b-4ae2-b607-1609f7439d68" class="clickable-i clickable-link-preview">ðŸ”—</span><div id="preview-modal-837d8f1a-dd2b-4ae2-b607-1609f7439d68" class="preview-modal"><div class="modal-header"><div id="x-837d8f1a-dd2b-4ae2-b607-1609f7439d68" class="clickable-x clickable-link-preview">x</div><b>Link preview</b></div><div class="preview-modal-title">What is a Workflow Task?</div><div class="preview-modal-description">A Workflow Task is a Task that contains the context needed to make progress with a Workflow Execution.</div><div class="preview-modal-tags"><span class="preview-modal-tag">term</span> <span class="preview-modal-tag">explanation</span></div></div> failed due to an unset or incorrect [Marker](/references/events/#markerrecorded) name.

Enter a valid Marker name and redeploy the Task.

## Bad Request Cancel Activity Attributes {#bad-request-cancel-activity-attributes}

This error either indicates the possibility of unset attributes for [RequestCancelActivity](/references/commands/#requestcancelactivity), or an invalid History Builder state.

Update the [Temporal SDK](/temporal/#temporal-sdk) to the most recent release.
Reset any unset attributes before retrying the [Workflow Task](/workers#workflow-task) <span id="i-19ccf909-2eda-44a2-934b-2af7a38e0270" class="clickable-i clickable-link-preview">ðŸ”—</span><div id="preview-modal-19ccf909-2eda-44a2-934b-2af7a38e0270" class="preview-modal"><div class="modal-header"><div id="x-19ccf909-2eda-44a2-934b-2af7a38e0270" class="clickable-x clickable-link-preview">x</div><b>Link preview</b></div><div class="preview-modal-title">What is a Workflow Task?</div><div class="preview-modal-description">A Workflow Task is a Task that contains the context needed to make progress with a Workflow Execution.</div><div class="preview-modal-tags"><span class="preview-modal-tag">term</span> <span class="preview-modal-tag">explanation</span></div></div>.

If you continue to see this error, review your code for [nondeterministic causes](/workflows/#code-changes-can-cause-non-deterministic-behavior).

## Bad Request Cancel External Workflow Execution Attributes {#bad-request-cancel-external-workflow-execution}

This error indicates that the [Workflow Task](/workers#workflow-task) <span id="i-0814dee2-1e2e-4447-887b-41de61fb156e" class="clickable-i clickable-link-preview">ðŸ”—</span><div id="preview-modal-0814dee2-1e2e-4447-887b-41de61fb156e" class="preview-modal"><div class="modal-header"><div id="x-0814dee2-1e2e-4447-887b-41de61fb156e" class="clickable-x clickable-link-preview">x</div><b>Link preview</b></div><div class="preview-modal-title">What is a Workflow Task?</div><div class="preview-modal-description">A Workflow Task is a Task that contains the context needed to make progress with a Workflow Execution.</div><div class="preview-modal-tags"><span class="preview-modal-tag">term</span> <span class="preview-modal-tag">explanation</span></div></div> failed while trying to cancel an [external Workflow](/workflows/#external-workflows).
Unset or invalid attributes can cause this to occur.

Reset any missing attributes, such as Workflow Id or Run Id.
Adjust any fields that exceed length limits.

If a [Child Workflow](/workflows/#child-workflows) is set to `Start` and `RequestCancel`, remove one of these attributes.
A Child Workflow cannot perform both actions in the same Workflow Task.

## Bad Schedule Activity Attributes {#bad-schedule-activity-attributes}

This error indicates unset or invalid attributes for [`ScheduleActivityTask`](/references/commands/#scheduleactivitytask) or [`CompleteWorkflowExecution`](/references/commands/#completeworkflowexecution).

Reset any unset or empty attributes.
Adjust the size of the received payload to stay within the given size limit.

## Bad Search Attributes {#bad-search-attributes}

This error indicates that the [Workflow Task](/workers#workflow-task) <span id="i-c7594fb5-0068-4526-a3b4-1eb4a722c0d1" class="clickable-i clickable-link-preview">ðŸ”—</span><div id="preview-modal-c7594fb5-0068-4526-a3b4-1eb4a722c0d1" class="preview-modal"><div class="modal-header"><div id="x-c7594fb5-0068-4526-a3b4-1eb4a722c0d1" class="clickable-x clickable-link-preview">x</div><b>Link preview</b></div><div class="preview-modal-title">What is a Workflow Task?</div><div class="preview-modal-description">A Workflow Task is a Task that contains the context needed to make progress with a Workflow Execution.</div><div class="preview-modal-tags"><span class="preview-modal-tag">term</span> <span class="preview-modal-tag">explanation</span></div></div> has unset or invalid [Search Attributes](/visibility#search-attribute) <span id="i-ac74be5b-1157-4e8d-9d49-19368033fdc9" class="clickable-i clickable-link-preview">ðŸ”—</span><div id="preview-modal-ac74be5b-1157-4e8d-9d49-19368033fdc9" class="preview-modal"><div class="modal-header"><div id="x-ac74be5b-1157-4e8d-9d49-19368033fdc9" class="clickable-x clickable-link-preview">x</div><b>Link preview</b></div><div class="preview-modal-title">What is a Search Attribute?</div><div class="preview-modal-description">A Search Attribute is an indexed name used in List Filters to filter a list of Workflow Executions that have the Search Attribute in their metadata.</div><div class="preview-modal-tags"><span class="preview-modal-tag">term</span> <span class="preview-modal-tag">explanation</span> <span class="preview-modal-tag">filtered-lists</span> <span class="preview-modal-tag">visibility</span></div></div>.
This can cause Workflow Tasks to continue to retry without success.

Make sure that all attributes are defined before retrying the Task.
Adjust the size of the Payload to fit within the system's size limits.

## Bad Signal Input Size {#bad-signal-input-size}

This error indicates that the Payload has exceeded the [Signal's](/workflows#signal) <span id="i-eb866acc-0d7b-4af7-bdfb-ab98c28b534e" class="clickable-i clickable-link-preview">ðŸ”—</span><div id="preview-modal-eb866acc-0d7b-4af7-bdfb-ab98c28b534e" class="preview-modal"><div class="modal-header"><div id="x-eb866acc-0d7b-4af7-bdfb-ab98c28b534e" class="clickable-x clickable-link-preview">x</div><b>Link preview</b></div><div class="preview-modal-title">What is a Signal?</div><div class="preview-modal-description">A Signal is an asynchronous request to a Workflow Execution.</div><div class="preview-modal-tags"><span class="preview-modal-tag">term</span> <span class="preview-modal-tag">signals</span> <span class="preview-modal-tag">explanation</span></div></div> available input size.

Adjust the size of the Payload, and redeploy the [Workflow Task](/workers#workflow-task) <span id="i-685cfd44-5eba-4c66-965a-e028cb10c5b8" class="clickable-i clickable-link-preview">ðŸ”—</span><div id="preview-modal-685cfd44-5eba-4c66-965a-e028cb10c5b8" class="preview-modal"><div class="modal-header"><div id="x-685cfd44-5eba-4c66-965a-e028cb10c5b8" class="clickable-x clickable-link-preview">x</div><b>Link preview</b></div><div class="preview-modal-title">What is a Workflow Task?</div><div class="preview-modal-description">A Workflow Task is a Task that contains the context needed to make progress with a Workflow Execution.</div><div class="preview-modal-tags"><span class="preview-modal-tag">term</span> <span class="preview-modal-tag">explanation</span></div></div>.

## Bad Signal Workflow Execution Attributes {#bad-signal-workflow-execution-attributes}

This error indicates that the [Workflow Task](/workers#workflow-task) <span id="i-25b03f92-d272-460d-8e58-1e090c97f853" class="clickable-i clickable-link-preview">ðŸ”—</span><div id="preview-modal-25b03f92-d272-460d-8e58-1e090c97f853" class="preview-modal"><div class="modal-header"><div id="x-25b03f92-d272-460d-8e58-1e090c97f853" class="clickable-x clickable-link-preview">x</div><b>Link preview</b></div><div class="preview-modal-title">What is a Workflow Task?</div><div class="preview-modal-description">A Workflow Task is a Task that contains the context needed to make progress with a Workflow Execution.</div><div class="preview-modal-tags"><span class="preview-modal-tag">term</span> <span class="preview-modal-tag">explanation</span></div></div> failed to validate attributes for [SignalExternalWorkflowExecution](/references/commands/#signalexternalworkflowexecution).

Reset any unset, missing, nil, or invalid attributes.
Adjust the input to fit within the system's size limits.

## Bad Start Child Execution Attributes {#bad-start-child-execution-attributes}

This error indicates that the [Workflow Task](/workers#workflow-task) <span id="i-a947c37c-0db5-49b1-b68f-9e309fe5e853" class="clickable-i clickable-link-preview">ðŸ”—</span><div id="preview-modal-a947c37c-0db5-49b1-b68f-9e309fe5e853" class="preview-modal"><div class="modal-header"><div id="x-a947c37c-0db5-49b1-b68f-9e309fe5e853" class="clickable-x clickable-link-preview">x</div><b>Link preview</b></div><div class="preview-modal-title">What is a Workflow Task?</div><div class="preview-modal-description">A Workflow Task is a Task that contains the context needed to make progress with a Workflow Execution.</div><div class="preview-modal-tags"><span class="preview-modal-tag">term</span> <span class="preview-modal-tag">explanation</span></div></div> failed to validate attributes for [`StartChildWorkflowExecution`](/references/commands/#startchildworkflowexecution)

Adjust the input size of the attributes to fall within the system's size limits.

Make sure that [Search Attribute](/visibility#search-attribute) <span id="i-6b7463be-1aa7-437c-8aeb-dbdd6271349b" class="clickable-i clickable-link-preview">ðŸ”—</span><div id="preview-modal-6b7463be-1aa7-437c-8aeb-dbdd6271349b" class="preview-modal"><div class="modal-header"><div id="x-6b7463be-1aa7-437c-8aeb-dbdd6271349b" class="clickable-x clickable-link-preview">x</div><b>Link preview</b></div><div class="preview-modal-title">What is a Search Attribute?</div><div class="preview-modal-description">A Search Attribute is an indexed name used in List Filters to filter a list of Workflow Executions that have the Search Attribute in their metadata.</div><div class="preview-modal-tags"><span class="preview-modal-tag">term</span> <span class="preview-modal-tag">explanation</span> <span class="preview-modal-tag">filtered-lists</span> <span class="preview-modal-tag">visibility</span></div></div> validation is performed after unaliasing keys.

## Bad Start Timer Attributes {#bad-start-timer-attributes}

This error indicates that the scheduled [Event](/workflows#event) <span id="i-067411bb-37dd-4890-a6ea-c8c944da2db1" class="clickable-i clickable-link-preview">ðŸ”—</span><div id="preview-modal-067411bb-37dd-4890-a6ea-c8c944da2db1" class="preview-modal"><div class="modal-header"><div id="x-067411bb-37dd-4890-a6ea-c8c944da2db1" class="clickable-x clickable-link-preview">x</div><b>Link preview</b></div><div class="preview-modal-title">What is an Event?</div><div class="preview-modal-description">Events are created by the Temporal Cluster in response to external occurrences and Commands generated by a Workflow Execution.</div><div class="preview-modal-tags"><span class="preview-modal-tag">term</span> <span class="preview-modal-tag">explanation</span></div></div> is missing a Timer Id.

<!-- TODO add Timer Id as anchor for term and link to it -->

Set a valid Timer Id and retry the [Workflow Task](/workers#workflow-task) <span id="i-4852fdbb-4ef4-436b-b859-df3d52e67bc0" class="clickable-i clickable-link-preview">ðŸ”—</span><div id="preview-modal-4852fdbb-4ef4-436b-b859-df3d52e67bc0" class="preview-modal"><div class="modal-header"><div id="x-4852fdbb-4ef4-436b-b859-df3d52e67bc0" class="clickable-x clickable-link-preview">x</div><b>Link preview</b></div><div class="preview-modal-title">What is a Workflow Task?</div><div class="preview-modal-description">A Workflow Task is a Task that contains the context needed to make progress with a Workflow Execution.</div><div class="preview-modal-tags"><span class="preview-modal-tag">term</span> <span class="preview-modal-tag">explanation</span></div></div>.

## Cause Bad Binary {#cause-bad-binary}

This error indicates that the [Worker](/workers) deployment returned a bad binary checksum.

<!-- TODO: get more information about binary -->

## Cause Bad Update {#cause-bad-update}

<!--TODO: add link to Workflow Update page when written -->

This error indicates that a [Workflow Execution](/workflows#workflow-execution) <span id="i-1ac20bb5-369f-40dd-91c1-f2b06385de7d" class="clickable-i clickable-link-preview">ðŸ”—</span><div id="preview-modal-1ac20bb5-369f-40dd-91c1-f2b06385de7d" class="preview-modal"><div class="modal-header"><div id="x-1ac20bb5-369f-40dd-91c1-f2b06385de7d" class="clickable-x clickable-link-preview">x</div><b>Link preview</b></div><div class="preview-modal-title">What is a Workflow Execution?</div><div class="preview-modal-description">A Temporal Workflow Execution is a durable, scalable, reliable, and reactive function execution. It is the main unit of execution of a Temporal Application.</div><div class="preview-modal-tags"><span class="preview-modal-tag">term</span> <span class="preview-modal-tag">explanation</span></div></div> tried to complete before receiving an Update.

`BadUpdate` can happen when a [Worker](/workers#worker) <span id="i-4ced1ea6-776f-4494-bf2e-ee798d0020a1" class="clickable-i clickable-link-preview">ðŸ”—</span><div id="preview-modal-4ced1ea6-776f-4494-bf2e-ee798d0020a1" class="preview-modal"><div class="modal-header"><div id="x-4ced1ea6-776f-4494-bf2e-ee798d0020a1" class="clickable-x clickable-link-preview">x</div><b>Link preview</b></div><div class="preview-modal-title">What is a Worker?</div><div class="preview-modal-description">In day-to-day conversations, the term Worker is used to denote both a Worker Program and a Worker Process. Temporal documentation aims to be explicit and differentiate between them.</div><div class="preview-modal-tags"><span class="preview-modal-tag">term</span> <span class="preview-modal-tag">explanation</span></div></div> generates a [Workflow Task Completed](/references/events#WorkflowTaskCompleted) <span id="i-e58a2c06-38bd-4525-ae2f-055641c8dd7c" class="clickable-i clickable-link-preview">ðŸ”—</span><div id="preview-modal-e58a2c06-38bd-4525-ae2f-055641c8dd7c" class="preview-modal"><div class="modal-header"><div id="x-e58a2c06-38bd-4525-ae2f-055641c8dd7c" class="clickable-x clickable-link-preview">x</div><b>Link preview</b></div><div class="preview-modal-title">Events reference</div><div class="preview-modal-description">Events are created by the Temporal Cluster in response to external occurrences and Commands generated by a Workflow Execution.</div><div class="preview-modal-tags"><span class="preview-modal-tag">reference</span></div></div> message with missing fields or an invalid Update response format.

This error might indicate usage of an unsupported SDK.
Make sure you're using a [supported SDK](/temporal#temporal-sdk).

## Cause Reset Workflow {#cause-reset-workflow}

This error indicates that the [Workflow Task](/workers#workflow-task) <span id="i-7ced7b9f-56b8-4a05-9f8e-b62406c1e8d9" class="clickable-i clickable-link-preview">ðŸ”—</span><div id="preview-modal-7ced7b9f-56b8-4a05-9f8e-b62406c1e8d9" class="preview-modal"><div class="modal-header"><div id="x-7ced7b9f-56b8-4a05-9f8e-b62406c1e8d9" class="clickable-x clickable-link-preview">x</div><b>Link preview</b></div><div class="preview-modal-title">What is a Workflow Task?</div><div class="preview-modal-description">A Workflow Task is a Task that contains the context needed to make progress with a Workflow Execution.</div><div class="preview-modal-tags"><span class="preview-modal-tag">term</span> <span class="preview-modal-tag">explanation</span></div></div> failed due to a request to reset the [Workflow](/workflows).

If the system hasn't started a new Workflow, manually reset the Workflow.

## Cause Unhandled Update {#cause-unhandled-update}

`UnhandledUpdate` occurs when a Workflow Update is received by the Temporal Server while a Workflow Task being processed on a Worker produces a Command that would cause the Workflow to transition to a closed state.

Temporal rejects the Workflow Task completion to guarantee that the Update is eventually handled by Workflow code and rewinds the Workflow so it can handle the pending Update.

This error can happen when the Workflow receives frequent Updates.

## Cause Unspecified {#cause-unspecified}

This error indicates that the [Workflow Task](/workers#workflow-task) <span id="i-7d9a4f37-3bcf-418e-a31a-6db91e4031b0" class="clickable-i clickable-link-preview">ðŸ”—</span><div id="preview-modal-7d9a4f37-3bcf-418e-a31a-6db91e4031b0" class="preview-modal"><div class="modal-header"><div id="x-7d9a4f37-3bcf-418e-a31a-6db91e4031b0" class="clickable-x clickable-link-preview">x</div><b>Link preview</b></div><div class="preview-modal-title">What is a Workflow Task?</div><div class="preview-modal-description">A Workflow Task is a Task that contains the context needed to make progress with a Workflow Execution.</div><div class="preview-modal-tags"><span class="preview-modal-tag">term</span> <span class="preview-modal-tag">explanation</span></div></div> has failed for an unknown reason.

If you see this error, examine your Workflow Definition.

## Failover Close Command {#failover-close-command}

This error indicates that a [Namespace](/namespaces) failover forced the [Workflow Task](/workers#workflow-task) <span id="i-b9f3070a-ef2b-4839-a413-74b5d6ebaf5c" class="clickable-i clickable-link-preview">ðŸ”—</span><div id="preview-modal-b9f3070a-ef2b-4839-a413-74b5d6ebaf5c" class="preview-modal"><div class="modal-header"><div id="x-b9f3070a-ef2b-4839-a413-74b5d6ebaf5c" class="clickable-x clickable-link-preview">x</div><b>Link preview</b></div><div class="preview-modal-title">What is a Workflow Task?</div><div class="preview-modal-description">A Workflow Task is a Task that contains the context needed to make progress with a Workflow Execution.</div><div class="preview-modal-tags"><span class="preview-modal-tag">term</span> <span class="preview-modal-tag">explanation</span></div></div> to close.
The system automatically schedules a retry when this error occurs.

<!--TODO: troubleshooting -->

## Force Close Command {#force-close-command}

This error indicates that the [Workflow Task](/workers#workflow-task) <span id="i-6f4ec861-51d4-4d29-8249-10c842629705" class="clickable-i clickable-link-preview">ðŸ”—</span><div id="preview-modal-6f4ec861-51d4-4d29-8249-10c842629705" class="preview-modal"><div class="modal-header"><div id="x-6f4ec861-51d4-4d29-8249-10c842629705" class="clickable-x clickable-link-preview">x</div><b>Link preview</b></div><div class="preview-modal-title">What is a Workflow Task?</div><div class="preview-modal-description">A Workflow Task is a Task that contains the context needed to make progress with a Workflow Execution.</div><div class="preview-modal-tags"><span class="preview-modal-tag">term</span> <span class="preview-modal-tag">explanation</span></div></div> was forced to close.
A retry will be scheduled if the error is recoverable.

<!-- TODO: more info-->

## Non-Deterministic Error {#non-deterministic-error}

The [Workflow Task](/workers#workflow-task) <span id="i-9c2f4dc4-4185-49fe-8b97-c236b77850ce" class="clickable-i clickable-link-preview">ðŸ”—</span><div id="preview-modal-9c2f4dc4-4185-49fe-8b97-c236b77850ce" class="preview-modal"><div class="modal-header"><div id="x-9c2f4dc4-4185-49fe-8b97-c236b77850ce" class="clickable-x clickable-link-preview">x</div><b>Link preview</b></div><div class="preview-modal-title">What is a Workflow Task?</div><div class="preview-modal-description">A Workflow Task is a Task that contains the context needed to make progress with a Workflow Execution.</div><div class="preview-modal-tags"><span class="preview-modal-tag">term</span> <span class="preview-modal-tag">explanation</span></div></div> failed due to a [nondeterministic error](/workflows/#code-changes-can-cause-non-deterministic-behavior).

<!-- TODO: info -->

## Pending Activities Limit Exceeded {#pending-activities-limit-exceeded}

The [Workflow](/workflows) has reached capacity for pending [Activities](/activities).
Therefore, the [Workflow Task](/workers#workflow-task) <span id="i-1b0dd4a1-bb14-44d4-b2da-bcff151346ba" class="clickable-i clickable-link-preview">ðŸ”—</span><div id="preview-modal-1b0dd4a1-bb14-44d4-b2da-bcff151346ba" class="preview-modal"><div class="modal-header"><div id="x-1b0dd4a1-bb14-44d4-b2da-bcff151346ba" class="clickable-x clickable-link-preview">x</div><b>Link preview</b></div><div class="preview-modal-title">What is a Workflow Task?</div><div class="preview-modal-description">A Workflow Task is a Task that contains the context needed to make progress with a Workflow Execution.</div><div class="preview-modal-tags"><span class="preview-modal-tag">term</span> <span class="preview-modal-tag">explanation</span></div></div> was failed to prevent the creation of another Activity.

Let the Workflow complete any current Activities before redeploying the code.

## Pending Child Workflows Limit Exceeded {#pending-child-workflows-limit-exceeded}

This error indicates that the [Workflow](/workflows) has reached capacity for pending [Child Workflows](/workflows/#child-workflows).
Therefore, the [Workflow Task](/workers#workflow-task) <span id="i-e9e20c5c-29b0-436d-a431-ae796869cb9c" class="clickable-i clickable-link-preview">ðŸ”—</span><div id="preview-modal-e9e20c5c-29b0-436d-a431-ae796869cb9c" class="preview-modal"><div class="modal-header"><div id="x-e9e20c5c-29b0-436d-a431-ae796869cb9c" class="clickable-x clickable-link-preview">x</div><b>Link preview</b></div><div class="preview-modal-title">What is a Workflow Task?</div><div class="preview-modal-description">A Workflow Task is a Task that contains the context needed to make progress with a Workflow Execution.</div><div class="preview-modal-tags"><span class="preview-modal-tag">term</span> <span class="preview-modal-tag">explanation</span></div></div>was failed to prevent additional Child Workflows from being added.

Wait for the system to finish any currently running Child Workflows before redeploying this Task.

## Pending Request Cancel Limit Exceeded {#pending-request-cancel-limit-exceeded}

This error indicates that the [Workflow Task](/workers#workflow-task) <span id="i-d14412fa-8534-4850-9a24-7140ff2e76de" class="clickable-i clickable-link-preview">ðŸ”—</span><div id="preview-modal-d14412fa-8534-4850-9a24-7140ff2e76de" class="preview-modal"><div class="modal-header"><div id="x-d14412fa-8534-4850-9a24-7140ff2e76de" class="clickable-x clickable-link-preview">x</div><b>Link preview</b></div><div class="preview-modal-title">What is a Workflow Task?</div><div class="preview-modal-description">A Workflow Task is a Task that contains the context needed to make progress with a Workflow Execution.</div><div class="preview-modal-tags"><span class="preview-modal-tag">term</span> <span class="preview-modal-tag">explanation</span></div></div> failed after attempting to add more cancel requests.
The [Workflow](/workflows) has reached capacity for pending requests to cancel other Workflows, and cannot accept more requests.

If you see this error, give the system time to process pending requests before retrying the Task.

## Pending Signals Limit Exceeded {#pending-signals-limit-exceeded}

The Workflow has reached capacity for pending Signals.
Therefore, the [Workflow Task](/workers#workflow-task) <span id="i-83ad2c6f-c2a6-4864-ae91-984234ee2596" class="clickable-i clickable-link-preview">ðŸ”—</span><div id="preview-modal-83ad2c6f-c2a6-4864-ae91-984234ee2596" class="preview-modal"><div class="modal-header"><div id="x-83ad2c6f-c2a6-4864-ae91-984234ee2596" class="clickable-x clickable-link-preview">x</div><b>Link preview</b></div><div class="preview-modal-title">What is a Workflow Task?</div><div class="preview-modal-description">A Workflow Task is a Task that contains the context needed to make progress with a Workflow Execution.</div><div class="preview-modal-tags"><span class="preview-modal-tag">term</span> <span class="preview-modal-tag">explanation</span></div></div> was failed after attempting to add more [Signals](/workflows#signal) <span id="i-ae6aeb7e-b957-492b-b744-33a7e0aed6d4" class="clickable-i clickable-link-preview">ðŸ”—</span><div id="preview-modal-ae6aeb7e-b957-492b-b744-33a7e0aed6d4" class="preview-modal"><div class="modal-header"><div id="x-ae6aeb7e-b957-492b-b744-33a7e0aed6d4" class="clickable-x clickable-link-preview">x</div><b>Link preview</b></div><div class="preview-modal-title">What is a Signal?</div><div class="preview-modal-description">A Signal is an asynchronous request to a Workflow Execution.</div><div class="preview-modal-tags"><span class="preview-modal-tag">term</span> <span class="preview-modal-tag">signals</span> <span class="preview-modal-tag">explanation</span></div></div> to an external Workflow.

Wait for Signals to be processed by the Workflow before retrying the Task.

## Reset Sticky Task Queue {#reset-sticky-task-queue}

This error indicates that the Sticky [Task Queue](/workers#task-queue) <span id="i-3a07df37-1469-4ea1-8478-6ddcdd9d69eb" class="clickable-i clickable-link-preview">ðŸ”—</span><div id="preview-modal-3a07df37-1469-4ea1-8478-6ddcdd9d69eb" class="preview-modal"><div class="modal-header"><div id="x-3a07df37-1469-4ea1-8478-6ddcdd9d69eb" class="clickable-x clickable-link-preview">x</div><b>Link preview</b></div><div class="preview-modal-title">What is a Task Queue?</div><div class="preview-modal-description">A Task Queue is a first-in, first-out queue that a Worker Process polls for Tasks.</div><div class="preview-modal-tags"><span class="preview-modal-tag">term</span> <span class="preview-modal-tag">explanation</span></div></div>needs to be reset.

If you see this error, reset the Sticky Task Queue.
The system will retry automatically.

## Resource Exhausted Cause Concurrent Limit {#resource-exhausted-cause-concurrent-limit}

This error indicates that the concurrent [poller count](/dev-guide/worker-performance/#poller-count) has been exhausted.

<!--TODO: more info needed -->

Adjust the poller count per [Worker](/workers).

## Resource Exhausted Cause Persistence Limit {#resource-exhausted-cause-persistence-limit}

This error indicates that the persistence rate limit has been reached.

<!--TODO: more info needed -->

## Resource Exhausted Cause RPS Limit {#resource-exhausted-cause-rps-limit}

This error indicates that the [Workflow](/workflows) has exhausted its RPS limit.

## Resource Exhausted Cause System Overload {#resource-exhausted-cause-system-overload}

This error indicates that the system is overloaded and cannot allocate further resources to [Workflow Tasks](/workers#workflow-task) <span id="i-8e2b6ff5-2dcd-47e8-9275-3211e0d65033" class="clickable-i clickable-link-preview">ðŸ”—</span><div id="preview-modal-8e2b6ff5-2dcd-47e8-9275-3211e0d65033" class="preview-modal"><div class="modal-header"><div id="x-8e2b6ff5-2dcd-47e8-9275-3211e0d65033" class="clickable-x clickable-link-preview">x</div><b>Link preview</b></div><div class="preview-modal-title">What is a Workflow Task?</div><div class="preview-modal-description">A Workflow Task is a Task that contains the context needed to make progress with a Workflow Execution.</div><div class="preview-modal-tags"><span class="preview-modal-tag">term</span> <span class="preview-modal-tag">explanation</span></div></div>.

<!--TODO: more info needed -->

## Resource Exhausted Cause Unspecified {#resource-exhausted-cause-unspecified}

This error indicates that an unknown cause is preventing resources from being allocated to further [Workflow Tasks](/workers#workflow-task) <span id="i-64f5c327-03a6-4e0c-88f4-7b0ff00a5762" class="clickable-i clickable-link-preview">ðŸ”—</span><div id="preview-modal-64f5c327-03a6-4e0c-88f4-7b0ff00a5762" class="preview-modal"><div class="modal-header"><div id="x-64f5c327-03a6-4e0c-88f4-7b0ff00a5762" class="clickable-x clickable-link-preview">x</div><b>Link preview</b></div><div class="preview-modal-title">What is a Workflow Task?</div><div class="preview-modal-description">A Workflow Task is a Task that contains the context needed to make progress with a Workflow Execution.</div><div class="preview-modal-tags"><span class="preview-modal-tag">term</span> <span class="preview-modal-tag">explanation</span></div></div>.

<!--TODO: more info needed -->

## Schedule Activity Duplicate Id {#schedule-activity-duplicate-id}

The [Workflow Task](/workers#workflow-task) <span id="i-8828c258-068a-4562-889b-789b5db750bd" class="clickable-i clickable-link-preview">ðŸ”—</span><div id="preview-modal-8828c258-068a-4562-889b-789b5db750bd" class="preview-modal"><div class="modal-header"><div id="x-8828c258-068a-4562-889b-789b5db750bd" class="clickable-x clickable-link-preview">x</div><b>Link preview</b></div><div class="preview-modal-title">What is a Workflow Task?</div><div class="preview-modal-description">A Workflow Task is a Task that contains the context needed to make progress with a Workflow Execution.</div><div class="preview-modal-tags"><span class="preview-modal-tag">term</span> <span class="preview-modal-tag">explanation</span></div></div> failed because the [Activity](/activities) Id is already in use.

Check your code to see if you've already specified the same Activity Id in your [Workflow](/workflows).
Enter another Activity Id, and try running the Workflow Task again.

## Start Timer Duplicate Id {#start-timer-duplicate-id}

This error indicates that a Timer with the given Timer Id has already started.

<!-- TODO link to Timer term when exists -->

Try entering a different Timer Id, and retry the [Workflow Task](/workers#workflow-task) <span id="i-f19d0770-fe24-48c4-babd-7046c78ca9a5" class="clickable-i clickable-link-preview">ðŸ”—</span><div id="preview-modal-f19d0770-fe24-48c4-babd-7046c78ca9a5" class="preview-modal"><div class="modal-header"><div id="x-f19d0770-fe24-48c4-babd-7046c78ca9a5" class="clickable-x clickable-link-preview">x</div><b>Link preview</b></div><div class="preview-modal-title">What is a Workflow Task?</div><div class="preview-modal-description">A Workflow Task is a Task that contains the context needed to make progress with a Workflow Execution.</div><div class="preview-modal-tags"><span class="preview-modal-tag">term</span> <span class="preview-modal-tag">explanation</span></div></div>.

## Unhandled Command {#unhandled-command}

This error indicates new available [Events](/references/events#) <span id="i-e070b71b-c29b-4ac0-aacd-6d8a8f975f86" class="clickable-i clickable-link-preview">ðŸ”—</span><div id="preview-modal-e070b71b-c29b-4ac0-aacd-6d8a8f975f86" class="preview-modal"><div class="modal-header"><div id="x-e070b71b-c29b-4ac0-aacd-6d8a8f975f86" class="clickable-x clickable-link-preview">x</div><b>Link preview</b></div><div class="preview-modal-title">Events reference</div><div class="preview-modal-description">Events are created by the Temporal Cluster in response to external occurrences and Commands generated by a Workflow Execution.</div><div class="preview-modal-tags"><span class="preview-modal-tag">reference</span></div></div> since the last [Workflow Task](/workers#workflow-task) <span id="i-243553fe-88f4-499e-aaff-16fb694ed3a8" class="clickable-i clickable-link-preview">ðŸ”—</span><div id="preview-modal-243553fe-88f4-499e-aaff-16fb694ed3a8" class="preview-modal"><div class="modal-header"><div id="x-243553fe-88f4-499e-aaff-16fb694ed3a8" class="clickable-x clickable-link-preview">x</div><b>Link preview</b></div><div class="preview-modal-title">What is a Workflow Task?</div><div class="preview-modal-description">A Workflow Task is a Task that contains the context needed to make progress with a Workflow Execution.</div><div class="preview-modal-tags"><span class="preview-modal-tag">term</span> <span class="preview-modal-tag">explanation</span></div></div> started.
The Workflow Task was failed because the [Workflow](/workflows#) <span id="i-8edc7bca-029e-4bf3-a596-18bd7542e992" class="clickable-i clickable-link-preview">ðŸ”—</span><div id="preview-modal-8edc7bca-029e-4bf3-a596-18bd7542e992" class="preview-modal"><div class="modal-header"><div id="x-8edc7bca-029e-4bf3-a596-18bd7542e992" class="clickable-x clickable-link-preview">x</div><b>Link preview</b></div><div class="preview-modal-title">What is a Workflow?</div><div class="preview-modal-description">In day-to-day conversations, the term "Workflow" frequently denotes either a Workflow Type, a Workflow Definition, or a Workflow Execution.</div><div class="preview-modal-tags"><span class="preview-modal-tag">term</span> <span class="preview-modal-tag">explanation</span></div></div> attempted to close itself without handling the new Events.

`UnhandledCommand` can happen when the Workflow is receiving a high number of [Signals](/workflows#signal) <span id="i-c266d36b-0d04-460e-b0dd-74e11c5076dc" class="clickable-i clickable-link-preview">ðŸ”—</span><div id="preview-modal-c266d36b-0d04-460e-b0dd-74e11c5076dc" class="preview-modal"><div class="modal-header"><div id="x-c266d36b-0d04-460e-b0dd-74e11c5076dc" class="clickable-x clickable-link-preview">x</div><b>Link preview</b></div><div class="preview-modal-title">What is a Signal?</div><div class="preview-modal-description">A Signal is an asynchronous request to a Workflow Execution.</div><div class="preview-modal-tags"><span class="preview-modal-tag">term</span> <span class="preview-modal-tag">signals</span> <span class="preview-modal-tag">explanation</span></div></div>.
If the Workflow doesn't have enough time to handle these Signals, a RetryWorkflow Task is scheduled to handle these new Events.

To prevent this error, drain the Signal Channel with the ReceiveAsync function.

If you continue to see this error, check your logs for failing Workflow Tasks.
The Workflow may have been picked up by a different [Worker](/workers#worker) <span id="i-0275a15f-d973-4663-8c03-902958fd8328" class="clickable-i clickable-link-preview">ðŸ”—</span><div id="preview-modal-0275a15f-d973-4663-8c03-902958fd8328" class="preview-modal"><div class="modal-header"><div id="x-0275a15f-d973-4663-8c03-902958fd8328" class="clickable-x clickable-link-preview">x</div><b>Link preview</b></div><div class="preview-modal-title">What is a Worker?</div><div class="preview-modal-description">In day-to-day conversations, the term Worker is used to denote both a Worker Program and a Worker Process. Temporal documentation aims to be explicit and differentiate between them.</div><div class="preview-modal-tags"><span class="preview-modal-tag">term</span> <span class="preview-modal-tag">explanation</span></div></div>.

## Workflow Worker Unhandled Failure {#workflow-worker-unhandled-failure}

This error indicates that the [Workflow Task](/workers#workflow-task) <span id="i-a5460b7e-7839-46a1-bb09-74054808ba2e" class="clickable-i clickable-link-preview">ðŸ”—</span><div id="preview-modal-a5460b7e-7839-46a1-bb09-74054808ba2e" class="preview-modal"><div class="modal-header"><div id="x-a5460b7e-7839-46a1-bb09-74054808ba2e" class="clickable-x clickable-link-preview">x</div><b>Link preview</b></div><div class="preview-modal-title">What is a Workflow Task?</div><div class="preview-modal-description">A Workflow Task is a Task that contains the context needed to make progress with a Workflow Execution.</div><div class="preview-modal-tags"><span class="preview-modal-tag">term</span> <span class="preview-modal-tag">explanation</span></div></div> encountered an unhandled failure from the [Workflow Definition](/workflows/#workflow-definition).
